message: Take it or leave it, Bob!
Split it down the middle, fair and square!
I'd rather wait for a better deal, Bob. The money is worth less now.
You can have a smaller share this time, Bob. But I'm still in control!
I'll take a smaller share, but I'm still not giving up!
You're being too greedy, Bob! I want a bigger share.
I'm being generous, Bob. Take it or leave it!
I'm starting to think I should have taken it in round 5...
You're trying to buy your way out, Bob. I'm not falling for it.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, Bob. But don't get too excited!
I'm not getting any younger, Alice. I need a better deal!
You're trying to squeeze me out, Bob. I'm not afraid of a little competition!
I'm being generous, Bob. Don't make me regret it!
I'm not going to back down now, Alice. This is my best offer!
You think this is your best offer? I'm not impressed, Bob!
I'm willing to give you a bit more, Bob. But don't think you're getting off that easily!
It's now or never, Alice. Take it or leave it!
Fine, Bob. You win this time. I'll take the 2000.
